Title: Krieg Nicht Lieb
Writer: Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Howard Gordon (developed for American television by), Alex Gansa (developed for American television by), Alexander Cary, Chip Johannessen
Actors: Claire Danes, Rupert Friend, Laila Robins, Tracy Letts
Plot: Carrie puts her life on the line to get her team out of Pakistan.
